title: This Didn't Go As Planned! Phanteks Evolv X Dual System Build
tags: how to build a gaming pc
description: The Phanteks Evolv X dual system build is finally here but fitting two systems inside one pretty compact case led to some serious issues. This one really didn't go as we had planned.  :(  Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Phanteks Evolv X:   Team Night Hawk White:   Z390 Taichi:   Z390 STRIX ITX:   MSI RTX 2080 Ti DUKE:   Noctua NH-D15:   Noctua NH-L9i:    Stream Deck Mini:    Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by the companies listed. This video is sponsored by Corsair / Elgato. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (via Amazon):  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #phanteksevolvx #phanteks #bestpccase2018 #hardwarecanucks
